conversations.content: So this is a Halloween party... ▷Everyone's having so much fun!◁
▷And this spare theater costume is perfect for us to jump in on the action!◁
Wait, Mascula.  ▷Huh? What's wrong?◁
What does one do at a party? ▷Well, you, um, wander around and enjoy talking to people!◁
But you can talk to people at any time. ▷Well...sure, I guess.◁
Hee hee hee!
What was that voice? ▷Gyaaa! Laxi, what the heck is that?!◁
▷There's something weird flying around! Could this be what we heard?!◁
Look carefully, Mascula. It's not flying— it's suspended in the air by a string. ▷Huh? Hey, you're right!◁
Well, crap! Can't believe you caught on to that so fast.
▷Luca! This was your doing?!◁
Yep! Mym and Estelle kept saying that all kinds of weird and spooooky things rear their ugly heads on Halloween.
And that sounded to me like a time for some quality prankage! But I guess there's no getting one past an android, huh?
Obviously not. Now stop with this nonsensical trickery.
No can do, buckaroo! It's HALLOWEEN, you feel me? 'Tis the season for pranking until you drop—and then you just keep on pranking from the floor!
C'mon, you guys should try it out. It'll make Halloween a blast for you!
▷You're nothing if not consistent, Luca.◁ Agonizingly consistent.
Well, well. I heard some sort of fuss happening, and imagine my complete lack of surprise to see Luca involved.
Did you really expect anything less from him considering the holiday?
Well, we can't let ourselves be outdone by the likes of Luca. Time to prank my sweet little heart out!
Just so long as it doesn't actually make any real trouble for people. Do not take things too far, understand?
(▷Elisanne gave PERMISSION for us to go pranking?!◁)
Right then. Let's all get in some good old-fashioned trickery and make this Halloween party a real treat!
(▷And even Euden is in on it?!◁)
This is incomprehensible. ▷Hmm? What's up, Laxi?◁
Say, Laxi. Since we don't do things like this often, do you want to join in?
Me? Why?
Well, since Halloween is all about tricks and treats, everyone in the Halidom will be going all-out with their pranks.
So you mean EVERYONE will become like Luca?!
Ha ha! I guess you could put it that way.
Luca is a nuisance enough on his own, but now there will be many of him running amok...
In other words, the Halidom is currently in a state of emergency.
WHAAAT?!
The Halidom will be in utter bedlam if I don't do something. I have to stop all the pranks right away.
▷Now hold on just a second, Laxi!◁ Don't you want to protect the Halidom, Mascula?
Look, there's clearly been some kind of misunderstanding here. This isn't anything you need to worry about.
But if everyone is playing pranks at once...
Mischief is just part of the party! It's a way for us all to have fun.
Everyone will have fun by getting up to mischief? This is incomprehensible.
A prank is a bad act. Tricking a person. Lying to them. Frightening them.
How could the one being pranked be having fun too?
You are correct that they are not normally laudable deeds, but they are also not the wholly bad or evil thing that you are portraying them to be.
I don't understand.
Hmm. I suppose it is a bit difficult to explain when you think about it...
Perhaps a bit of real-time learning might help you understand.
So you want me to conduct a prank?
Exactly! I think it's safe to assume you've never done so, based on your reaction.
Affirmative. I've been pranked, but never done it myself.
I figured as much. In that case, let's get you up to some Halloween mischief!
Exactly! Learn by doing and all that.
You can often understand something by looking at it from a different perspective.
▷Well, I think this is a great idea, because I've been wanting to know more about pranks for a while now.◁
▷I mean, something Luca likes can't be all bad, right?◁
▷C'mon, Laxi! Let's try some pranks!◁
I suppose I am a bit curious, so...okay.
My heart feels funny when I don't understand something. I don't like it. I want to understand the meaning of pranks!
Mym gave us this box, but what is it? ▷It's called a ＂jack-in-the-box.＂ Luca had one just like it.◁
▷If you open it like so...◁
▷There's a spring inside that will make something pop out!◁
Ah! It pops out really fast... You'd be surprised if you opened it without knowing.
I see. All you have to do is give this to someone and have them open it. It seems like an easy prank.
▷Right. And since someone just arrived, it's time to give it a shot!◁
Target acquired. Commencing prank.
Alex, do you have a moment?
Of course. What do you need?
I have a request. Please open this box.
Er, can you not open it yourself?
I can open and close the box at will.
Sooo...why not just do that, then?
...I can't tell you the reason. I just want you to open it.
Hmm. I smell a rat...
Oh, of course! This is a Halloween prank! Which means this box is...
Ah, I knew it. It's a jack-in-the-box.
*grumble* Alex wasn't surprised... ▷She figured it out before she even opened the thing! Prank failed.◁
Well, it WAS a terrifically obvious prank.
If you want to surprise someone with a jack-in-the-box, you have to trick them into opening it in a more natural way.
So I can't simply hand the box over. I have to trick them...
▷Yeah, now that you mention it, Luca always had some crazy story ready when he handed someone the jack-in-the-box.◁
▷He'd say something that caught their interest and make them want to open it.◁
What should I say to tempt them into opening the box?
▷Well, I suppose it all depends on the person you're talking to.◁ That doesn't tell me anything. Answer clearly.
▷Actually, I'm not sure I CAN answer any more clearly that that, Laxi. Sheesh! Tricking people is hard.◁
The rare occasion on which we agree. Tricking people is indeed difficult.
But I won't give up on pranking.
I must successfully prank someone so I can finally understand how such an action might bring them happiness.
Mascula, are there any pranks that can be done without tricking someone?
▷Well, it seems like you have trouble tricking people with words, so maybe if you didn't have to talk to them...?◁
▷Aha! I've got it!◁
I left the labels unchanged and swapped the salt and sugar inside the containers. Is that it? ▷Perfect!◁
▷Since this one is all planned in advance, you can do it without talking to anyone!◁
Nearby footsteps confirmed. ▷Quick, hide!◁
Dear me, but I am busy. After the laundry, I still need to prepare supper.
Here you are. Enjoy, everyone.
This consommé is nearly translucent! It doesn't get like this unless you're truly diligent in skimming it. You are simply a treasure, Cleo.
Best to eat it before it gets cold.
PPPPPFFFFFFFTTTT!
Good heavens! What is the matter?!
PIPPLE BLEEEEEEECH!
It appears this is one soup that Pipple does not wish to be cooked into.
Is our love for Cleo being tested? Never fear! I shall—
Hands off that spoon, buddy! Life's too short to be shovin' terrible food into yer head hole.
Yo, Cleo, what's the deal? Did ya even taste this before ya served it?
I fear I was too busy to do so—but it is a recipe I know by heart, so the thought of it failing so badly is simply impossible.
Enough. Give me that spoon.
What in the...? It's SWEET! But I know I put salt into it!
Prank successful.
Laxi! Did you replace my salt with sugar?!
Affirmative. That was me. Are you happy?
NO, I AM NOT HAPPY, LAXI! I AM NOT REMOTELY HAPPY!
This isn't a prank—it's a nuisance!
Oh... Are you angry, Cleo?
OF COURSE I AM! WHAT WERE YOU THINKING?!
(Just as I suspected: Playing pranks only makes people angry at you.)
(Is it truly possible to make people happy with such shenanigans?)
▷Boy, Cleo sure got mad at us.◁ That was a long lecture.
Hey, kids. I caught the end of that mega tongue-lashing you got. What happened? Did you guys try to pull a prank?
▷Hello, Luca. Well, you see...◁
...So the prince told you that mischief was all just part of people having fun and you ran with it, eh?
Heh. Nice one, Euden!
But I don't understand how pranks could be fun for everyone.
▷So we figured it might make sense if we tried one ourselves—which we did.◁
Okay, I see what the deal is here, so just leave it to me.
I'll show you how to pull off a prank that surprises and delights everyone!
Why did Luca call me here...?
Um...I'm coming in, okay?
Why is it so dark in here? The sun won't even set for hours yet.
EEEK! Something fell on me!
EEEK! AAAHHH! EEEEP! IS IT RAIN?! IS IT SNOW?! HOW COULD THIS BE HAPPENING INSIDE A ROOOOOOM?!
EEEE...uh. Wait, this isn't rain. It's CANDY!
Now, Laxi!
Understood. Opening curtain.
Happy Halloween, Pia!
Happy Halloween.
Luca! And, um, Laxi? I'm so confused.
Yeah, that's my bad. I just meant to play a quick little prank on you, but I guess I gave you quite the scare instead.
But the candy is actually a present for you, so take as much as you want!
REALLY?! REALLY AND TRULY?!
Of course! So do ya like it?
I love it! Thank you, Luca! Thank you, Laxi!
Though she was pranked, Pia was happy. ▷So it DOES work if you do it right!◁
Sure does! The important thing is to always have a sense of fun about it.
So long as you've got that, your pranks will give folks permission to laugh a little instead of...ya know. Enraging them.
And if you add a little bit of that to a gift, it becomes a SURPRISE gift that sends people clear over the moon!
Tell me more.
Well, take the gift I gave Pia earlier. If I just handed her some candy, it'd be pretty boring. I mean, candy's great, but you get what I mean.
But if you surprise 'em a little first, and then reveal the truth, it's more fun for me AND the person getting pranked!
▷Yeah, I suppose you wouldn't easily forget a gift like that.◁
Exactly! It becomes a treasured Halloween memory for life!
Pia's kinda shy and quiet, so I knew she'd have trouble with all the Halloween stuff other people get up to.
But now she has some great memories of the holiday to carry with her!
▷So that was your reason for choosing Pia as your victim!◁
▷You're really a kind person, Luca.◁
Aw, cut it out before I start to blush.
Anyway, I'm out. You two play tons of pranks and really enjoy your Halloween!
...... ▷What is it, Laxi?◁
Luca's reason for pranks was unexpected. ▷Right? I can't believe he did all that because he was worried about Pia.◁
▷And that makes me think about the time back then when Luca...◁ Mascula?
▷Do you remember when Luca surprised us by suspending that weird thing in the air with some string?◁
Of course. What about it? ▷Well, maybe that prank was also a sign of Luca's thoughtfulness.◁
How do you mean? ▷You know! Like with Pia! Maybe he was worried about someone and just trying to help them out.◁
▷Back then, you and I were pretty worried about the Halloween party, right?◁
▷But when Luca pranked us, it turned into a whole thing with everyone and helped us fit in to the action.◁
You're overthinking this. There's a high probability it was merely a coincidence. ▷No, really! I think it was because Luca was worried about the two of us.◁
▷I mean, remember what he said?◁
▷He wanted us to enjoy our Halloween.◁
C'mon, you guys should try it out. It'll make Halloween a blast for you!
You two play tons of pranks and really enjoy your Halloween!
Yes, I suppose he did say that.
(I thought of Luca's prank as no more than a nuisance, but perhaps it was actually a sign of his thoughtfulness.)
So you believe that Luca...helped us? ▷That's exactly what I think.◁
In that case, I have a proposal for you. ▷Oh? What is it?◁
Let us return the favor and play a Halloween prank on Luca.
I don't want to only be a receiver of kindness. If one pranks you, you prank them back; one kindness for another.
▷I love it, Laxi! Let's do it!◁
▷After all, a Halloween prank is something that makes people happy!◁
▷So I wanna pull one on my best buddy Luca and enjoy it together!◁
Then we agree. Commencing operations. ▷Let's make it the best prank ever!◁
▷We need to come up with a plan to ensure our prank on Luca is a success.◁
▷Our target is a master of mischief, so any old prank isn't going to cut it; he'll figure it out before we can even start to pull it off!◁
I concur. So what sort of strategy do you think would work? ▷Yeah, hmm...◁
▷Sorry. I can't really think of anything.◁ You're no help at all, Mascula.
▷Well, do YOU have any ideas?!◁ Hmm...
I can't think of any. ▷Ha! How quickly the worm turns!◁
▷I think this is going to be hard for us to manage on our own.◁ We require reinforcements.
...Huh? You want to prank Luca back?
Ooooh, I like it! I owe him for like ten million pranks. I'm not usually a prankster, but it's Halloween and all, so count me in!
Great. You're his sister, so you should know Luca very well. I bet you'll come up with an effective strategy.
Yeah, well, much as I'd like to say ＂okie-doke, leave it to me,＂ I'm a little worried about pulling this off.
▷Even though you know Luca well, coming up with a plan will be difficult? ◁
It's BECAUSE I know him so well that it'll be tough. That blockhead might only be brilliant at pranks, but he's indisputably brilliant at them. You get me?
If we come at him with some half-cocked prank, he'll see right through it.
▷Yeah, I guess that's true.◁ Our supposition was correct.
But! It's much too soon to be giving up. If we can't do it alone—or with two or three of us—then we'll just get more!
I'll put word out to the Halidom and gather up anyone who can help. Just stay put for a little bit, 'kay?
You are dependable, Sarisse. ▷Yeah, I can't wait to see what you come up with!◁
Mascula, this... ▷...might have gotten out of hand.◁
I hereby call the first meeting of the Dunk-On-Luca Committee to order!
Yeah!
Yeeeeah!
▷I'm sort of shocked at the turnout, but also grateful that all these people have come here for us.◁
You better believe I want a chance to pay Luca back for all his dumb pranks!
Me too! Plus, it's Halloween, so I'm gonna do my best to be a bad kid.
I have little interest in pranks and other such mischief, but I understand wanting to get closer to people on Halloween, which is why I am here.
Then let's get this party rocking and make sure everyone has a great time!
All right, people, let's hear those ideas! You mind taking notes, Sylas?
As I am quite busy with my research, I am ONLY helping with planning. Is that understood?
Okay, okay! I'll start! What if we tried a little something like THIS! First, we...
It's not bad, but there is a problem. If this situation were to occur, we...
Oh, right. In that case, what if we revised things to be like...
▷This is great! Everyone's sharing their ideas and our plan is taking shape.◁
Agreed. Under these conditions, it will be possible to prank Luca back. ▷And not just that.◁
▷I really feel like something big is happening—something that we couldn't have done with just the two of us.◁
Something big...that the two of us couldn't have predicted or accomplished on our own...
(Curious. When I think about it, it makes me feel a kind of heat in my heart.)
(It does not feel unpleasant, however.  Just what IS this sensation?)
And so, the friends of the Halidom lent their efforts to the cause, and the details of a plan to prank Luca were solidified.
Time for our final checks before putting the plan into action! First?
I'll go to Luca and ask him for help! I'll be like, ＂Eek, I saw a fiend!＂
Right. And then when Lowen comes back with Luca in tow, what happens?
Then we fight the fiend! But we make it look like we're in a tough spot and about to lose.
Help, Luca. Help.
Come on, Althemia. That's not going to make him think, ＂She's in trouble!＂ You gotta do it like THIS!
HAAAAALP! THIS FIEND IS GOING TO REND ME LIMB FROM LIMB! OH, WHERE IS A MIGHTY HERO TO SAVE MEEEEE?!
That's almost frighteningly good, Mym. Anyway, once we get to this point, it turns out the fiend is actually...
A costume sewn together by Althemia! ▷And we'll be controlling it from above with a string to make it look like it's attacking.◁
With roars courtesy of me. I'll do my best to sound like a ferocious fiend. Rooooar!
You're making fine use of your experience pretending to be a zombie!
Anyway, all that is sure to get him in a panic to help everyone, which means he'll loose an arrow—and THEN?!
▷The costume will split open and all the apples inside will come tumbling out!◁ This will be our present to Luca.
A prank AND a gift! It's perfect!
All right. If everybody's got the plan committed to memory, let's begin!
I'll go call Luca!
▷We'll be waiting up in the tree, Laxi.◁ Understood. This is important, so I'll double-check the operation of the costume.
This really came out, didn't it? It looks just like a fiend.
Right?! I'm good at sewing myself, but I can't hold a candle to Althemia.
I can teach you, if you like.
Yessss! Thanks, Althemia!
Say, are Lowen and Luca coming?
He only just left to go get him, so it seems a little soon yet.
Gya! It's a fiend! A real one, you guys!
We must defeat it quickly, or the entire plan will be for nothing.
Wait, Laxi! Leave the fiend to us. You get the prank costume to safety.
But fighting together would defeat the foe more quickly.
This fiend is just like the sugar-loving one that came from the Sweet Retreat, which means it's after...
THE APPLES INSIDE THE COSTUME!
This fiend is just like the sugar-loving one that came from the Sweet Retreat, which means it's after...
THE APPLES INSIDE THE COSTUME!
It's true! It's not even paying attention to us—it's going right for the costume!
▷Laxi!◁ I'm on it.
▷We'll control the costume and avoid the fiend attacks while you all defeat it!◁
Got it! Haaah!
Hraaaah!
Now's our chance!
Let's hit it together, Sarisse! Ready...GO!
HEEEY! Are you guys okay?!
I called Luca here so he could help with... Uh, wait. Why are there two fiends?
All right, what the hey is going on here? Lowen said you were getting your butts kicked by a fiend, but you clearly just won in a landslide.
Also, it looks like you're trying to protect that other fiend there? This is all weird.
Uh...y-yeah! See, that's...umm...
Give it up, Sarisse.
Unfortunately, the plan is a failure.
No. The plan is fine.
Have you got an idea, Laxi?!
Remember the idea we rejected during the committee meeting? If we put that into play, there won't be any issue.
Oh! I remember that idea!
What are you guys talking about?
I will explain...
Hey, what's everyone whispering about? Also, don't you want to maybe move away from that fiend a bit?
...Looks like everyone is good. Let's do this!
LUCAAAA! RUUUUUUN!
Huh?! Melsa?!
Everyone is being controlled by this fiend!
We're going to end up attacking you!
So THAT'S why you were protecting it!
I can't believe he's falling for this... He really is a total dumdum.
Don't just stand there marveling at him! We have to play our role! ...Please help, Luca! Defeat this terrible fiend and free us from its sway!
All right, just leave it to me! Eat this, fiend! Haaaaah!
We're good now, everyone! I shot the fiend, so it's all going to be...
Apples? Wait, why is it filled with apples?
Mission accomplished.
Laxi?! Where did you come from?!
The apples are a present for you.
Happy Halloween, Luca!
...Wuh?
▷It's a surprise present, Luca!◁ Just as you did for Pia, we devised a prank with a sense of fun to it.
OOOOH! Ha ha ha! I get it now!
Man, I was totally bamboozled there. This is one hell of a prank, I tell you what!
It was thanks to everyone helping us.
Well then, thanks, everybody! It makes me super happy that you went to all this trouble for me.
...And now, a thank-you party! I made pie with all of the apples you gave me!
Hmm. The pies look a bit...so-so, but the truth is in the tasting...
BLECH! Okay, yeah. That's bad.
I had never heard of Luca being able to cook. Of course this was the result.
Hey, take it easy!
Well, we can definitely tell how much gratitude you put into the pie.
Aw, thanks, Sarisse. Now eat up!
But it's ALSO filled with charred bits and burning and grossness, so, uh, pass.
Ha ha ha!
(It's the heat in my heart again—just like I felt while we were planning our prank.)
(What is this phenomenon?)
Looks like you're enjoying the party, Laxi. I'm glad to see it.
Me? Enjoying?
I mean, you're smiling. That usually means you're enjoying something, right?
▷That's right. Plus, I can feel all of your happy emotions.◁
I'm...enjoying myself...
I understand now. The warmth in my heart...this smile on my face...it's what having fun feels like. It means I'm enjoying the party.
I also enjoyed it when we were thinking up pranks with the others. It was fun.
Sounds like someone finally gets what's fun about pranks.
Affirmative. I understand it better. ▷That's because Luca told us what was important when it comes to pranking.◁
▷And by working hard to do something fun for Luca, we ended up all having a bunch of fun ourselves.◁
Seems like you appreciate the true pleasure of pranks AND parties now!
▷All because of you, Luca! Thanks!◁ Yes. Thank you.
I'm now able to understand the meaning behind Halloween parties. We played a prank and everyone enjoyed themselves.
I'll never forget the events of today, even after hundreds or thousands of years.
So long as this body and heart continue to function, I will remember.
